channel.title: Looking for a developer
channel.description:
Hello everyone, this may or may not be in the correct thread, but please move accordingly as I didn't know where to put it other than here.
As the title says, I'm looking for a developer to host a Runescape Private Server with me, as I have little knowledge of Java, but would love to own one.
The VPS will be bought today c: I can also make the website, as I have had a lot of experience with Website Hosting myself.
If you're interested please add my Skype - matthewkemp18
(I also don't want you to feel like you're the only one working on the client & server, so i'd like you to teach me some things so we can cooperate with each-other without you doing all the server/client work)
Thanks again!

item.title: Looking for a developer
item.dc:creator: @Cledi Cledi
item.description:
